Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.domain

Class Data

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.domain.Data
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Data>
public class Data extends Object implements Comparable<Data>
Represents a date through the day, month, and year.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Data()
    Constructs an instance of Data with the default date.

    Constructs an instance of Data by receiving the year, month, and day, calling the @method setData.
    Data(Data otherDate)
    Constructs an instance of Data with the same characteristics as the date received by parameter.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Data otherDate)
      Compares the date with the other date received by parameter.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Data>
      Parameters:
      otherDate - the date to be compared.
      Returns:
      the value 0 if the otherDate received is equal to the date; the value -1 if the otherDate is after the date; the value 1 if the otherDate is before the date.

    • isGreater

      public boolean isGreater(Data otherDate)
      Returns true if the date is greater than the date received by parameter. If the date is less than or equal to the date received by parameter, returns false.
      Parameters:
      otherDate - the other date with which the date is compared.
      Returns:
      true if the date is greater than the date received by parameter, otherwise returns false.

      Returns the difference in number of days between the date and the date received by parameter.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • over18

      public boolean over18(Data data)
      Verifies if the difference between two dates exceeds 18 years
      Parameters:
      data - to be compared
      Returns:
      true if exceeds 18 years, false otherwise

    • difference

      public int difference(int year, int month, int day)
      Returns the difference in number of days between the date and the date received by parameter with year, month, and day.
      Parameters:
      year - the year of the date with which the date is compared to calculate the difference in number of days.
      month - the month of the date with which the date is compared to calculate the difference in number of days.
      day - the day of the date with which the date is compared to calculate the difference in number of days.
      Returns:
      difference in number of days between the date and the date received by parameter with year, month, and day.

    • isLeapYear

      public static boolean isLeapYear(int year)
      Returns true if the year passed by parameter is a leap year. If the year passed by parameter is not a leap year, returns false.
      Parameters:
      year - the year to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the year passed by parameter is a leap year, otherwise returns false.

    • currentDate

      public static Data currentDate()
      Returns the current date of the system.

      the current date of the system.
